description.en: The world experienced a cataclysm and monsters are now roaming the Earth. Born out of a necessity to subjugate these monsters, this new era saw the rise of a new profession. Monster Trainers – individuals who conquer, cultivate, and train these monsters. Thus begins the story of Gao Peng. An ambitious young man with dreams of his own, who gets launched right into the golden age of monster cultivation. Gao Peng: “Even if it’s a loach, I’ll be able to evolve it into a dragon that can soar to the heavens!”

altTitles.en: Don't Be Afraid, Stay With Me

altTitles.ja: こわがらないで、そばにいて

description.en:
I thought it would go well for you and me from here on after. "Let's pretend it never happened. From the very beginning."  
  
Ono Shizuka is a baker who got into an argument with his partner Sakai and fell off the stairs. The accident caused him to forget about Sakai entirely. However, he now is very interested in the beautiful but lonely man.
description.pl:
*Udawajmy, że to się nie wydarzyło.*  
Ono Shizuka to cukiernik, który pokłócił się ze swoim partnerem i spadł ze schodów. W wyniku wypadku całkiem zapomniał o Shizuce. Jednak wciąż jest bardzo zainteresowany tym pięknym, ale samotnym mężczyzną.

description.en: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.

altTitles.en: Survival in Another World with My Mistress!

altTitles.ja-ro: Craft Game no Nouryoku de Isekai Kouryaku!!

altTitles.en: Different World Survival to go with the Master

altTitles.ru: Захватить другой мир с силой майнкрафта!
Захватить другой мир с силой ремесленных игр!

altTitles.ja: ご主人様とゆく異世界サバイバル！

altTitles.zh: 跟主人一起在异世界生存!

altTitles.zh-hk: 跟主人一起在異世界生存！

altTitles.ja: ご主人様とゆく異世界サバイバル! THE COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Goshujin-sama to Yuku Isekai Survival! THE COMIC

description.en:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world!  

――This is a light for life in a different world.  When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf…?!  
  
Start different world capture with different races and sub-races!  

---

- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)
description.es:
Supervivencia en el otro mundo con mi maestro  
¿¡Kousuke se encontró en un mundo completamente diferente!?  
De pie allí, con el desierto al este y un bosque a su izquierda, decidió hacer un buen uso de la ocurrencia y pone a prueba su conocimiento, donde encuentra esta increíble habilidad de creación, ¡al igual que los juegos de su mundo original!
description.ja:
気が付けば、そこは異世界だった!?目の前には荒野と背後には森が広がる大地に立っていたコースケ。

培った知識から森でサバイバルをしていたところ、元の世界でプレイしていたサバイバルゲームのように道具を作れるクラフト能力を手に入れていたことに気が付いた。

——これで異世界生活にも光明が。と思っていたところ、いきなり美人ダークエルフに襲われて……!?

異種族・亜人種たちとゆく異世界攻略スタート!!

---

- [Official LN (JP)](https://gcnovels.jp/goshujin/)  
- [Original WN (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3742ey/)
description.ru: Косукэ оказался в совершенно ином мире. Стоя там посреди дикой природы в густом лесу, он решил использовать это перемещение с умом и проверить свои знания выживания! Там он находит эту удивительную возможность крафта, точно такую же, как и в игре из его изначального мира!

description.en: In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.

altTitles.ja: 魔王学園の反逆者

description.en:
Yuuto is an ordinary high school boy who, one day, notices a mysterious tarot card by his bed. He shows it to his parents, who give him the good news - as the son of demonking, he is eligible to become the next Demon Lord. As such, Yuuto is soon brought to a demonic academy in order to improve his devilish skills and earn the title of demon lord. And, you know, get a harem along the way.   
  
From the author of Masou Gakuen HxH and Ecstas Online.
description.pt-br: "A humanidade é nada mais que escrava para uma raça demoníaca - Um estudante comum do ensino médio, Morioka Yuuto, foi escolhido para ser candidato ao próximo rei demônio. Ele é transferido para o colégio Ginsei, aonde é tratado com desdenho pelos outros estudantes. [Juro que vou te fazer ser rei demônio. Por isso... me torne a sua serva!] Yuuto se encontra com uma linda demônio, Himegami Lizel, que muda o seu mundo e sua vida. Ele pode aprender qualquer tipo de magia instantaneamente e absorver poder mágico infinitamente ao ter contato com suas servas. Esse é um poder especial que os demônios não tinham e era concedida a apenas a um humano, Yuuto. O humano que se tornou candidato a rei demônio e desafiou os mais fortes demônios para ser o próximo rei! Emocionante e fascinante. A fantástica história de ascensão em um colégio de magia se inicia!"

altTitles.ja: ダークハンター~放課後のふたり~

altTitles.en: Dark Hunter: Two of After School

description.en:
Keinoshin and Shotaro are students who spend their after school hours as Dark Hunters. Darkness and light both exist in the world, and it is their job to protect the balance between them. Kei and Sho used to be close friends when they were little, but now they are only reluctant partners. At school, they're seen as opposites--the cool and aloof Sho and the cute and friendly Kei. However, they must work together if they want to stop the forces of darkness. Their first case of the manga involves the mysterious vanishing of many cats and dogs in the area, and a second involves a little boy who can see the 'ghost' of an old homeless man he had befriended.

(from mangaupdates)

altTitles.ja: 派遣とバリキャリ

altTitles.en: Eastern Strange Legend of Wise Spirits - Cheating Detective Satori
Eastern Strange Legend of Wise Spirits - Foul Detective Satori

altTitles.pt-br: Estranha Lenda Oriental dos Sábios Espíritos  ~ A Detetive Trapaceira Satori

altTitles.ja: 東方智霊奇伝　反則探偵さとり

altTitles.vi: Đông Phương Trí Linh Kỳ Truyện ~ Thám Tử Bất Tuân Satori

description.en:
The fifth official Touhou manga (and the first webcomic) written by ZUN and originally drawn by Ginmokusei. 

Touhou Chireikiden focuses on Satori Komeiji's endeavors as a detective, solving mysteries around Gensokyo.

*Serialization was paused for a few months after volume 2 was finished due to the health concerns of the original artist Ginmokusei. The series resumed serialization with Yuu Akimaki as the new artist.*

- **Links:**
[Manga on NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44569)
[Touhou Web Blog](https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/)

- **New serialisation:**
[Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0BQ5KZHYV)
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/356764/list/)
[EbookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/701436/)
description.vi:
Manga chính thức thứ 5 của Touhou, kịch bản được viết bởi ZUN và được minh họa bởi Ginmonkusei (Sau này được đổi thành Akimaki Yuu vì sức khỏe của Ginmonkusei có vấn đề) 

Bộ truyện tập trung vào Satori Komeji, một yêu quái có khả năng đọc tâm trí người khác, cô bắt đầu trở thành thám tử và đi giải quyết các vụ án ở khắp Ảo Tưởng Hương.
description.es-la:
Cada vez que en Gensokyo se produce un incidente en el que está involucrado un youkai, la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei suele resolver la situación confrontando al culpable. Sin embargo, los casos en los que los culpables ocultan su identidad suelen ser demasiado complejos como para que la exterminadora de youkais se encargue de ello.

Entra en escena Satori Komeiji. Como youkai satori, posee un tercer ojo que le permite leer las mentes, detectando a cualquier criminal sin importar las mentiras que pueda inventarse. Con su extraordinaria aptitud como detective, Satori es capaz de resolver todos los misterios que se le plantea, aunque no siempre quiera salir de su mansión.
description.pt-br:
Touhou Chireikiden é a primeira webcomic oficial da série Touhou Project, escrita por ZUN com ilustrações da novata Ginmokusei, apresentando Satori Komeiji como a mestra detetive das profundezas da Terra.

Pode ser lido em japonês gratuitamente no web blog oficial: https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/

title.en: No Longer Allowed In Another World

altTitles.ja: 異世界失格

altTitles.en: No Longer Allowed in Another World
No Longer Human… In Another World

description.en:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers—sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?
___
Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book Ningen Shikkaku (No Longer Human/Disqualified From Being Human/Human Disqualification).
description.ru: После неудачного двойного самоубийства, наш главный герой переносится в другой мир. И чтобы не случилось, он обещает, что найдёт свою любовь и в этом мире, и опять покончит с собой.
description.uk: Як і у відомій книзі Осаму Дадзая "Бракована людина" / "Крах людини", головний герой цієї історії намагається вчинити подвійне самогубство зі своєю коханою... але замість цього його збиває вантажівка і він потрапляє в інший світ. Тепер він хоче знайти свою кохану, щоб знову покінчити життя самогубством разом з нею.
description.pt-br: Em 13 de junho de 1948, o autor Osamu Dazai estava prestes a se suicidar com Shizuko Ota mas foi convocado para outro mundo. Agora ele quer encontrar a reencarnação de sua amante, para que possa cometer suicídio com ela.

description.en:
The world began to change, one day.  
  
Apart from the living humans, demons began to appear in the human world.  
Humans, along with exorcists, established the 'Evil Hunter' group to fight against the demons in order for them to survive.  
  
In times when the humans are threatened by demons, "Evil Hunters" take place to do their tasks just as their name depicts.

title.en: Unparalleled in the Online Gaming World (Remake)

altTitles.zh: 网游之天下无双【重制版】

description.en: Lu Chen had an abnormal game physical test, reduced neural delay, and lost his memory from yesterday. He was surrounded by layers of mysteries. When he unlocked a special profession and was ready to return to the peak, but another accident happened…

altTitles.en: Sealed Record of the Forbidden God

altTitles.ja: フェイトディメンション

description.en: Every night, Jiang Xiao Ya has a recurring dream of the same mysterious man. He’s got fire-red hair and indescribable power. One day, by pure coincidence, she meets him in real life! As it turns out, this man has a very important job: he’s guarding ancient, dormant beasts. To make matters worse, Jiang Xiao Ya inexplicably inherits the powers of Jiang Zi Ya, and gets drawn into the battle against these ancient beasts. A tale that transcends time and space unfolds!

title.en: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ja: 陰キャだった俺の青春リベンジ 天使すぎるあの娘と歩むReライフ

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ru: Месть моей юности: Моя жизнь с девушкой, которая была слишком похожа на ангела

altTitles.en: The Revenge of My Youth: My Re Life with a Girl Who Was Too Much of an Angel

altTitles.ja: 陰リベ

description.en:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life …… was gray and shady, but he’s sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

*“I feel like you’ve changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You’re still kind, but you’ve grown up, and that’s wonderful!”*

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that I’ve acquired, I’m going to take my revenge on my second youth with her–!
description.id: bercerita tentang seorang budak korporat bernama Niihama Shincirou yang bekerja di perusahaan gelap dia pingsan setelah kelelahan bekerja dan ketika terbangun ia terkejut karena ternyata dia mengalami lompatan waktu dan kembali ke masa di mana dia masih seorang murid SMA. lalu karena dia sudah kembali ke masa lalu dia bertekad untuk balas dendam dengan menjadi lebih aktif dan berjuang untuk mendapatkan hal yang dia inginkan tidak peduli siapapun lawannya sampai pada akhirnya menebus semua penyesalan yang telah ia lakukan di kehidupan sebelumnya...
description.ja:
ブラック企業勤めの社畜サラリーマン・新浜心一郎は、過労の末に職場で倒れ――――目が覚めると高校時代に！？
タイムリープ青春"リベンジ"ラブコメ、ここに開幕！
description.pt-br:
Niihama Shinichirou, o qual desmaiou após ser explorado ao extremo por uma ‘companhia exploradora’ e ao acordar descobriu que havia sido mandado de volta para o segundo ano do ensino médio. Sua vida escolar foi sombria e melancólica… No entanto, ele tem certeza de que agora pode recomeçar.
Haruka Shijouin, uma linda garota que ele conheceu antes, de repente parece ainda mais inocente e bonita do que Shinichirou se lembrava, e acima de tudo, ela olha diretamente para ele… 

“Eu sinto que você está bem diferente do Niihama que eu conhecia ontem. Você continua gentil, mas você cresceu, e isso é maravilhoso!” 

Se eu pudesse mudar o futuro, eu definitivamente iria salvá-la depois que ela tirou a própria vida após sofrer severamente por conta de bullying. Com a mentalidade adulta e poderes corporativos que adquiri, eu vou me vingar da minha segunda juventude com ela–!

title.en: Isekai Teni Shite Kyoushi ni Natta ga, Majo to Osorerareteiru Ken ~Aoi-sensei no Gakuen Funtou Nisshi~

altTitles.ja: 異世界転移して教師になったが、魔女と恐れられている件　～アオイ先生の学園奮闘日誌～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Teni Shite Kyoushi ni Natta ga, Majo to Osorerareteiru Ken - Aoi-sensei no Gakuen Funtou Nisshi

altTitles.en: I Was Transferred To Another World And Became A Teacher, But I'm Feared As A Witch: Aoi-sensei's Academy Struggle Log

altTitles.es-la: Fui llevada a otro mundo, me convertí en maestra, pero ahora todos me temen como a una bruja

description.en: Aoi is a new teacher who has been transported to another world. Aoi is picked up by Owen, an elf, and as they live together, Aoi masters more and more of Owen's magic and even surpasses him. In order to refine her magic further, she is assigned to teach at the Fiddich Academy, a school of magic! Aoi starts her teaching career showcasing overwhelming magical abilities, and she is not daunted by the aristocratic troublemakers who dominate the academy. However, her abilities have become the talk of the school...
description.ja: 異世界に転移してしまった、新人教師のアオイ。エルフのオーウェンに拾われ一緒に暮らすなかで、アオイはオーウェンの持つ魔法をどんどんマスター。より魔法を極めるため、魔術学校であるフィディック学院に教師として赴任することに！学院内にのさばる貴族の問題児たちにも屈せず、圧倒的な魔法能力で教師生活をスタートさせたアオイ。しかし、その能力ゆえに学院内で話題になってしまい・・・。
description.es-la: Aoi es una nueva maestra que ha sido transportada a otro mundo. Mientras es recogido por el elfo Owen y vive con él, Aoi gradualmente domina la magia de Owen. Para seguir dominando la magia, decidí aceptar un trabajo como profesora en Fiddik Academy, ¡una escuela de magia! Aoi no cede ante los problemas de los hijos de los aristócratas de la escuela y comienza su vida como maestra con una habilidad mágica abrumadora. Sin embargo, debido a su habilidad, se convirtió en un tema candente dentro de la escuela... ¡Un comienzo turbulento en la vida escolar de la nueva maestra Aoi!

altTitles.ja: かみながしじま ～輪廻の巫女～

description.en: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!
description.ru: Старшеклассница Аманэ Мико - известная Мико в своем родном городе. Однажды она попадает в странное дорожно-транспортное происшествие и обнаруживает, что просыпается в мире, наполненном гротескно выглядящими монстрами, бродящими вокруг...! Постоянный страх нападения этих монстров! Однако, чтобы разгадать тайны этого мира, Мико продвигается сквозь этот мир отчаяния. Сотрудничая с другими выжившими девушками, чтобы сбежать с этого уединенного острова в далеком море в этом паническом хорроре!

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I Got to Remote Class, I Had to Move in With the Most Beautiful Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

altTitles.es-la: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.es: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.tr: Uzaktan Eğitime Başladığımda, Sınıfımdaki En Güzel Kızla Aynı Eve Taşınmak Zorunda Kaldım

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night. She is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet, and asks him to help. He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!

The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!
description.es: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.ja:
とある感染症が蔓延し、学生寮が閉鎖となって途方に暮れていた高校生・吉野叶多は、
夜中の公園で一人スマホを振り回すという奇行を見せるクラス1の美少女・星川遥と出会った。
機械音痴でネット接続の仕方がわからないと語る星川に助けを求められ、
家をお邪魔した吉野だったが、実は彼女には秘めた目的があって──！？
誘い受け上手なお嬢様とはじめる、イチャ甘同居ラブコメディ開幕！
description.es-la: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Kanata Yoshino, que estava perdendo o juízo, conhece Haruka Hoshikawa, a garota mais bonita da sua turma, que estava agitando seu smartphone sozinha em um parque no meio da noite. Ela é ruim com máquinas e não sabe se conectar à internet, e pede ajuda a ele. Ele acaba visitando a casa dela, mas ele mal sabe que ela tem um propósito secreto...!

A doce e romântica comédia de amor de coabitação começa com o habilidoso convite da jovem!

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her ... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this? A fascinating erotic story drawn by Jura from the popular doujin circle "JACK-POT".
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？ 大人気同人サークル「JACK-POT」のじゅらが描く、魅惑の背徳物語。

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

altTitles.ja: スロウスタート

description.en: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが死ぬほど難しい

description.en:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.
description.ja:
元プロゲーマーの堂山海は、ある日突然「チュートリアル」という名の異空間に招待された。 軽い気持ちで最凶クラスの難易度「ヘル」を選択してしまった彼は、離脱不可能、生存率ほぼゼロの「死にゲー」に挑むことになってしまった。 殺伐としたこの世界で生き残るために課せられたミッションをクリアしながら、チュートリアルに秘められた秘密を解き明かしていく。

gandara 퓨전 판타지 장편소설 '튜토리얼이 너무 어렵다' 가 웹툰으로 독자 여러분을 찾아갑니다.

삶이 무료하던 어느 날, 내 눈앞에 나타난 초대 메세지. 
[튜토리얼 세계에 입장하시겠습니까?] 

그리고 뒤이어 나타난 난이도 선택 창.

За ним сразу же вылезло окно выбора сложности. [Лёгкая] [Обычная] [Сложная] [Адская]. Я без колебаний выбрал адскую сложность.

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.en: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
description.es:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!

description.en: A fallen angel with falling grades! Gabriel White Tenma has descended from heaven to attend high school and guide humanity, but a newly found video game addiction might say otherwise.
description.ru: Габриэль-Тенма Уайт была одной из самых прилежных учениц Академии Ангелов. Но вот пришло время выпуска, и Габриэль отправилась на Землю дабы выполнить порученную ей миссию: показать людям правильный путь и подарить им счастье. Однако, действительно ли всё будет именно так? Не изменит ли ангела новое место, куда она попала?..
description.pt-br:
A comédia desenrola-se em torno de Gabriel White, que se formou no topo da classe na escola de anjos e que frequenta uma escola humana na terra em busca de conhecimento, mas, um jogo web atrai toda a sua atenção e acaba decidindo que dá muito trabalho ir para outros lugares.  
  

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 5, Cap 39.] ( Porém pulou os capítulos 29 e 38, além disso o episódio 12 é original. )

description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: If You Don’t Know Romance, You’ll Die

description.en: I’ve been transported into a novel but don’t know which one; given my taste for prickly male leads, one must be here. I must restore the mixed-up novels or face death! I can’t even remember the plots!

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

[Fairy Tale Scans] The arrogant and cold Yu Xingji, the leader of the Twelve constellation deities, traded his memories in exchange for reincarnating a thousand times in order to find his true love. During his 1001st reincarnation, he's reborn into the life of a college professor, where he meets Qin Ling, an aloof young man in possession of strange spiritual powers. When a strange event suddenly happens on the school campus, Yu Xingji couldn’t help but find himself standing in front of Qin Ling to protect him during the most critical moment!While the relentless reincarnation cycles may have erased the memories and appearance of his lover, only the emotions carved in his bones and engraved in the heart will guide them to reunite once again.

altTitles.ja: おぼろとまち

description.en: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!
description.ja: 平凡な人生を送る事を恐れていた仁科真知は、父の勧めで東京に出る事をこれ幸いとばかりに承諾する。東京の高校へと進学し、真知は一人暮らしを開始！　だが、自称忍者の同級生・香住朧と出会い、彼女の人生は変化して!?
description.pt-br: De Miyagi à vida agitada de uma escola secundária de Tóquio, Machi Nishina queria tudo menos o comum. Seu desejo é atendido da forma mais inesperada quando ela encontra Oboro Kasumi, um colega de classe que guarda um segredo, que acaba seguindo sua casa...?! Uma nova era de amizade e comédia juvenil se desenrola!

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

altTitles.ja: 凍結したプレイヤーの帰還

altTitles.fr: Le retour du joueur qui était congelé
Le retour du joueur de gel

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

description.zh-hk:
世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

description.en: For centuries, the grim reaper Ari guided souls to the afterlife, feeling lonely because no one could see her head. One day, a human named Woo-chul, who can see her head, offers to help find it. Can Ari find her head and ease her loneliness? This is the romance drama of Ari and Woo-chul, crossing between the realms of the living and the dead.

title.en: The Crazy Killer Whale’s Favourite Penguin

description.en:
Born as a penguin, I miraculously transformed into a human. The problem? My guardian, the Tower Master, hates beastmen. Fearing discovery, I ran away, only to be found out by a self-proclaimed penguin enthusiast.

Whale clan orca beastman, Suuradel, looked at me intensely, his eyes reddening sensually.

“Ha… Your wild eyes are incredible.”

Those aren’t eyes, just white feathers.

“May I touch your belly fat?”

Seriously? Furious, I pecked at him, but he looked oddly elated.

“Did you just kiss me?”

…It seems I got caught by a lunatic, not a penguin enthusiast.

title.en: Sasen Sareta Saikyou Kenja, Kyoushi ni Natte Muteki no Class wo Tsukuriageru

altTitles.ja: 左遷された最強賢者、教師になって無敵のクラスを作り上げる

altTitles.en: Demoted to a Teacher, the Strongest Sage Raises an Unbeatable Class

description.en: Monsters have long threatened humanity’s existence. To fight against these beings, Keith, the youngest person to ever become a sage, joins a knight order and shows immense success on the battlefield. However, that doesn’t last long, as a quarrel with an incompetent higher-up gets him fired from the order. With nowhere to go, Keith is assigned as a teacher, and with his talent for bringing out the best in his students, his class is about to reach unbelievable heights...
description.ja: 人類の生存圏を脅かす「魔物」。史上最年少で賢者の称号を持つキースは、魔物を討伐する騎士団に所属していた。しかし、無能な上官と揉め騎士団を追放されてしまう。キースが左遷された先は騎士学校。教師となったキースは、生徒たちを常識はずれな強さへと育て上げていき…。最強教師と、無敵を目指す生徒たちの騎士物語。

altTitles.ja: 天敵の彼は私の契約者

description.en:
I, Go Eun-woo, have lived while hiding my status among humans. I used my abilities to reduce the pain of scarlet fever, the fate of the Tiger tribe, which I have suffered from since I was 18, but was discovered by the Tiger's natural enemy, Imae.
“Don’t be so foolish. If you run away, you’ll die by my hands in a month or so.”
Moreover, this cold and frighteningly handsome Lee Mae,
I can’t believe I have the same seal as Lee Do-hoon. I bought time by lying, but it's only a matter of time before I get caught. I have to escape from his grasp somehow... !
“Please stay in my room with me for the time being.”
Can I go back to my normal daily life?!
description.ko:
인간들 사이에서 호(狐)족임을 숨긴 채 살아온 나, 고은우.
열여덟 살 때부터 앓아 온 호족의 숙명, 홍열의 고통을 줄이고자
능력을 썼다가 호족의 천적 이매에게 발각되고 말았다.

"머리 굴리지 마. 도망치면 한 달이고 뭐고, 넌 내 손에 죽어."

게다가 이 냉랭하고 무시무시하게 잘생긴 이매,
이도훈과 인장이 같다니.
거짓말로 시간은 벌어 놨지만, 들키는 것 역시 시간 문제다.
어떻게든 그의 수중에서 빠져나가야 하는데…!

"당분간 내 방에서 함께 지내."

나… 평범한 일상으로 돌아갈 수 있을까?!

title.en: I'm a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed

altTitles.es-la: Soy Una Santa Falsa Pero Los Dioses Están Obsesionados Conmigo

description.en:
I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later. If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building! But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess... 

"Choose me, or else..." 

"I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—" 

"..." 

The male leads reacted differently than I expected. 

[The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.] 

I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods. On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

altTitles.ja: きみは、ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

altTitles.en: Return with the Power of the King

description.en: In a world where one's worth is determined by how powerful their skill is, Taehyeon is 35, unawakened, and barely able to scrape by as a pack bearer for monster hunters. But when a mysterious being calling itself “the King” gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others!

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

altTitles.vi: Yêu Quái Cô Đơn Và Cô Bé Bị Mù

altTitles.ja: ぼっち怪物と盲目少女

altTitles.pt-br: O Monstro Solitário e a Garota Cega

description.en:
A lonely monster, living in seclusion in the forest, wishes she could live amidst humans despite her frightening appearance. 
Everything changes when she starts getting a visitor–a blind human girl who’s fascinated with her mysterious forest friend. 
As the monster and the girl grow attached in their secluded world, their love proves that beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
description.pt-br:
Nas profundezas de uma floresta, uma garota-fera vive seus dias solitária, até que um dia ela encontra uma invasora, 
uma jovem moça cega que acaba adentrando a floresta atraída pelas flores. 
Pela primeira vez um humano não sentiu medo e demonstrou ser gentil com ela.
Encantada pela situação, a fera mente e começa a se encontrar com a jovem, contando-lhe histórias e aventuras. 
E aos poucos, essa conexão especial começa a aquecer o coração dessa fera solitária.

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiōng Tái Kànjiàn Wǒ Dìle Ma

altTitles.ja: 君、弟を見なかったか?

description.en: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

Baek Jinwoo, savior of humanity, is done with being a hero. In his last moments, this battle-scarred warrior vows never to pick up a sword again. But by some cruel twist of fate, he finds himself reborn as Riley Finn Epheletta, the youngest son of an esteemed family of swordmasters!

When trouble comes knocking, Riley is forced to make a decision — take up the sword, or let his loved ones die. Will the “Lazy Sword” finally bloom into the legendary swordmaster he was always destined to become?
description.pt-br:
Ele é um guerreiro que foi escolhido pela espada sagrada por causa de sua vontade de salvar a humanidade, mas se cansou de viver para os outros. Pela salvação, ele derrotou o último adversário, o Rei Demônio, e decidiu morrer. Para aliviar o peso de ser um guerreiro e o mestre da espada sagrada, ele iria desistir de sua vida e cair em um descanso profundo…

“Oh! Parece que o jovem mestre quer empunhar uma espada o mais cedo possível!”

“Conde! Olha só o mestre! Ele já está interessado em espadas!”.

O Guerreiro que desistiu de sua vida para fugir da espada acabou reencarnando como filho mais jovem de um mestre espadachim?!

“Eu prefiro morrer de novo!!”

description.en:
'Sonidor', a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that could not be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at the house and asks to wake up the crown prince who has fallen into eternal sleep. "I want you to wake him up."

Sonidor enters the dream of 'Marmel', the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. “You were just going to kill me?!” 

According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reason why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?
description.pl: "Będę trzymać jego ręce, by obudzić go z wiecznego snu"  Sodinor, ekspert do spraw snów, ma umiejętność spełnienia marzeń nawet w świecie snów. Na rozkaz cesarza została wprowadzona do snu księcia Marmella, który nie mógł się obudzić.  Jednak w snach księcia, który znany jest ze swojej dobroci i łagodności, jest coś bardzo dziwnego. Jego kraina marzeń jest opuszona i bezbarwna.   Sonidor infiltrując sny Marmella pod postacią uroczego zwierzątka udaje się znaleźć powód jego długiego letargu...  Czy Marmell obudzi się w końcu z wiecznego snu?

title.en: After Constantly Dying, I Became the Emperor Venerable

altTitles.en: After Constantly Trying to Die, I Became the Emperor Venerable

altTitles.zh: 不断作死后,我成了万人迷帝尊

description.en: ...Emperor Yan Ge: It is better to send me to death than to send the emperor away, thank you. The immortals: He actually said thank you to me, really, I cried to death. Emperor Yan Ge: ...

title.en: Quick Transmigration: Kneeling and Begging the Main Villainess to Be a Person

description.en: Sheng Wenyin was deceived to death in her previous life, and when she was reborn, she was still the 18th-line female star who was full of slander. This time, Sheng Wenyin stopped pretending, and the scumbag sprayed all kinds of tricks, and instead became popular in the circle. Biological parents, five older brothers, more than a dozen nephews and nieces have recognized their relatives one after another, and they are the unmarried couple who have made baby kisses with Nine Golden Film King Qisi..

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.zh: 悠哉兽世：种种田，生生崽精品

altTitles.zh-ro: Youzai Shou Shi: Zhong Zhong Tian, Sheng Sheng Zai

description.en: As soon as she fell into the world of beastmen, a leopard forcibly took her back to his home. Indeed, Bai Jingjing is at a complete and utter loss. The males in this world are all handsome beyond compare, while the women are all so horrid that even the gods shudder at their sight. As a first-rate girl from the modern world (she's even a quarter Russian) Bai Jingjing finds herself sitting at the center of a harem filled with beautiful men – at the very peak of existence.
